messages.content: You are a helpful assistant.
What is the penalty for a vehicle's build being reduced to half its starting value or lower?
One penalty die is applied to all Drive Auto (or appropriate skill) rolls.
You are a helpful assistant.
What is the effect of 10 hit points of damage on a vehicle's build?
Each full 10 hit points of damage decreases a vehicle's build by 1 point (round down);
You are a helpful assistant.
What happens if a vehicle's build is reduced to half its starting value or lower?
It is impaired;
You are a helpful assistant.
What is considered damage below 10 hit points?
Damage below 10 hit points is ignored.
You are a helpful assistant.
What happens if a vehicle takes damage equal to its full build value in one incident?
The vehicle is completely wrecked in an impressive manner.
You are a helpful assistant.
What is the recommended action for those who are fortunate during a wreck?
They should take at least 2D10 damage.
You are a helpful assistant.
What happens to a vehicle if its build is reduced to zero by cumulative damage?
It becomes undrivable, grinding to a halt.
You are a helpful assistant.
What is the armor rating for passengers and driver?
The armor rating reflects the number of points of armor the vehicle provides against external attacks.
You are a helpful assistant.
What happens to a vehicle's drivability if the starting build value is exceeded?
it becomes undrivable, grinding to a halt
You are a helpful assistant.
What is the armor rating for passengers and driver?
the number of points of armor the vehicle provides against external attacks
You are a helpful assistant.
What happens to passengers and crew if the vehicle is attacked?
the number of people that can be accommodated
You are a helpful assistant.
What is the consequence of a Sanity loss of 5 points or more?
make an Intelligence roll— if successful, temporary insanity ensues
You are a helpful assistant.
What does the armor rating represent?
the number of points of armor the vehicle provides against external attacks
You are a helpful assistant.
What is the purpose of the cumulative Sanity points lost to a Mythos entity?
to record the cumulative loss of Sanity points for a given Mythos entity
You are a helpful assistant.
What happens if a Sanity loss exceeds the maximum amount for a single encounter?
the cumulative loss should not exceed the maximum amount for a single encounter with that entity
You are a helpful assistant.
What is the consequence of making an Intelligence roll when Sanity loss is 5 points or more?
temporary insanity ensues
You are a helpful assistant.
What is the duration of a bout of madness in 'real time' mode?
1D10 rounds
You are a helpful assistant.
How does the investigator behave in 'real time' mode?
Must fight/flee or take a penalty die on skill rolls
You are a helpful assistant.
What happens when the investigator fails a Sanity roll to test for delusions?
Lose 1 Sanity point (and undergo a bout of madness if insane)
You are a helpful assistant.
How much Cthulhu Mythos skill is added to the investigator's first bout of madness inspired by a Mythos-related event?
5% Cthulhu Mythos skill
You are a helpful assistant.
What is the consequence of failing a Sanity roll for delusions?
lose 1 Sanity point (and undergo a bout of madness if insane)
You are a helpful assistant.
How does the Keeper determine if an investigator recovers from indefinite insanity?
roll at the end of each month of treatment
You are a helpful assistant.
What happens when an investigator is treated at home for insanity?
success (or under psychoanalysis skill); add 1D3 Sanity points
You are a helpful assistant.
How is the Cthulhu Mythos skill added to an investigator's madness?
add 5% Cthulhu Mythos skill with first bout of madness inspired by a Mythos-related event
